title: Fix output bugs, scalafmt can format itself!

comments.body:

```diff
@@            master     #75   diff @@
======================================
  Files           14      14       
  Stmts          726     737    +11
  Branches        87      93     +6

======================================
+ Hit            700     711    +11
  Partial          0       0       
  Missed          26      26       
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`5659709`][3]

body:
* correctly calculate column of multiline tokens
* fix bug in var assignment to underscore
* fix bug in interpolate with expr
* add all files in project to FidelityTest, yay

Unfortunately, slightly slower now. Probably due to multiline
calculations in State.next.
```
[info] Benchmark                 Mode  Cnt     Score    Error  Units
[info] BaseLinker.scalafmt       avgt   10   538.226 ± 25.889  ms/op
[info] Division.scalafmt         avgt   10  2203.449 ± 71.571  ms/op
[info] SourceMapWriter.scalafmt  avgt   10   205.113 ±  6.549  ms/op
```
